price: 82. Waxay ahaayeen kuwo ka qota buuraha guryo iyago aamin ah.
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
